collectible.title: New Collectible
collectible.subtitle: "A Crownguard never falters."
collectible.text: Luxanna Luxanna—or Lux, as she prefers to be called—grew up in the Demacian city of High Silvermere, along with her older brother Garen. They were born to the prestigious Crownguard family, which had served for generations as protectors of the kings of Demacia. Their grandfather saved the king's life at the Battle of Storm's Fang, and their aunt Tianna was named commander of the elite Dauntless Vanguard regiment before Lux was born.
